sense.gloss: show, display, pretensions, appearances, ostentation, vanity
good outward appearance, looking nice, being attractive, making a fine show
to look attractive, to look nice, to be set off (by)
workmanship, execution, shape and quality (of an article), finishing touches
prosperity, glory, splendour, splendor, majesty, luxury
winning by picking up a discarded tile
ups and downs of life, vicissitudes of fortune
